UniprotID	Q06136
Accession	Q06136;B2R5Y1;B4DMX0
EntryName	KDSR_HUMAN
ProteinName	3-ketodihydrosphingosine reductase (KDS reductase) (EC 1.1.1.102) (3-dehydrosphinganine reductase) (Follicular variant translocation protein 1) (FVT-1) (Short chain dehydrogenase/reductase family 35C member 1)
GeneName	KDSR FVT1 SDR35C1
Length	332
Function	Catalyzes the reduction of 3'-oxosphinganine (3-ketodihydrosphingosine/KDS) to sphinganine (dihydrosphingosine/DHS), the second step of de novo sphingolipid biosynthesis.
Subcellular Location	Endoplasmic reticulum membrane
